ARABIC: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Have no fear. I will be with you, All-Hearing and All-Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (The Lord) said: "Be not afraid. I am verily with you, and I hear and see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "Have no fear. I am with you, hearing and seeing all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Lord replied them, "Do not be afraid; I Am with you all the time, listening and seeing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Do not fear – I am with you, All Hearing and All Seeing.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He (Allah) said: "Fear not, verily, I am with you both, hearing and seeing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Fear not, surely I am with you both: I do hear and see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Fear not,' said He. 'Surely I shall be with you, hearing and seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Fear not. Lo! I am with you twain, Hearing and Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God said, "Do not fear; I am with you both. I hear and I see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said; fear not; verily I shall be With you twain: I shall hear and see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Do not be afraid, for I will be with the two of you, hearing and seeing [whatever happens].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Fear not: for I am with you: I hear and see (everything).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He (Allah) said: "Fear not, verily! I am with you both, hearing and seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He replied: 'Have no fear I shall be with you, both hearing and seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Do not fear, I am with you, I hear and I see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:46] He said, ‘Do not fear, for I shall be with the two of you, by [providing you with] My assistance, hearing, what he says, and seeing, what he does.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Allah said to them: (Fear not) being beaten or killed. (Lo! I am with you twain) helping you, (Hearing) what you will be told (and Seeing) what he will do with you.
